messages.text: Hey team, our EC2 instances in us-east-1 are not reachable via SSH.
Check the security groups. Make sure port 22 is open for your IP range.
Ah yes, security group was missing the rule. Added it and SSH works now. ✅
Our S3 bucket is giving AccessDenied when trying to upload files via CLI.
Check the IAM role attached to your EC2 instance. Make sure it has s3:PutObject permission.
Fixed! IAM role was missing the correct policy. Uploads are working now. ✅
RDS instance is failing to connect from our Lambda function.
Make sure the Lambda is in the same VPC and security group allows outbound traffic to RDS port 5432.
Moved Lambda to correct VPC and updated SG rules. Connection works now. ✅
CloudFormation stack creation fails with ValidationError: Template format error.
Check your YAML syntax. A missing colon or incorrect indentation usually causes this.
Corrected the YAML indentation. Stack creation succeeded ✅
